properties.areaDesc: Waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 22 at 3:56PM CST until January 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 4 to 6 feet.

* WHERE...Waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal
City LA from 20 to 60 NM and Coastal waters from Lower
Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA out 20 NM.

* WHEN...Until noon CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY
